question: Please analyze this URL https://finestel.com/
thought: I need to start by checking the content of the website to see if there are any signs of a scam. The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text and check for any signs of a scam. I have observed that the website https://finestel.com/ offers crypto trading software development services, copy trading, and white label solutions. It also provides information about its services, pricing, customer testimonials, and frequently asked questions. There is no indication of unusually low prices, claims of free money, or non-existent companies. The content does not target human psychological weaknesses and the website appears to be professionally designed. The information provided is up to date and the website uses common payment methods. Based on this analysis, the website does not exhibit characteristics of a scam website. {

answer.reason: //finestel.com/ does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website. It offers legitimate services and information without any signs of a scam.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
